00030 namespace {
00031   const char cb64[]="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
00032 }

00038 FixedRandomStringGenerator::FixedRandomStringGenerator(int n) : m_nchars(n) {
00039   assert(n>0);
00040   m_nints = ((m_nchars * 6) + 7) / 8;
00041   m_ivec.resize(m_nints);
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 void FixedRandomStringGenerator::write(char *buf) {
00047   size_t indexi=0, indexo=0;
00048   uint8_t *in = (uint8_t *)&m_ivec[0];
00049 
00050   for (size_t i=0; i<m_nints; i++)
00051     m_ivec[i] = System::rand32();
00052 
00053   indexi = 0;
00054   indexo = 0;
00055   while (indexo < m_nchars) {
00056 
00057     buf[indexo++] = cb64[ in[indexi] >> 2 ];
00058     if (indexo == m_nchars)
00059       break;
00060 
00061     buf[indexo++] = cb64[ ((in[indexi] & 0x03) << 4) | ((in[indexi+1] & 0xf0) >> 4) ];
00062     if (indexo == m_nchars)
00063       break;
00064 
00065     buf[indexo++] = cb64[ ((in[indexi+1] & 0x0f) << 2) | ((in[indexi+2] & 0xc0) >> 6) ];
00066     if (indexo == m_nchars)
00067       break;
00068 
00069     buf[indexo++] = cb64[ in[indexi+2] & 0x3f ];
00070     
00071     indexi += 3;
00072   }
00073 
00074   buf[indexo] = 0;
00075   
00076 }
